channel.title: Object +character token
channel.description: Ok so I've google searched and searched mopar ect.. and well what I'm trying to do is to change a character token when it saves, To be specific i'm trying to change the token for summong, c.lastsummon = -1 img trying to get that token to save as 0 and not as -1 when a summoned npc is dismissed, Please help!Im using a Pi base BTW (Project Insanity).

item.title: Object +character token
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

ok well nvm I found the answer and also no its not equivalent to it at all because if you depending on a char token to either move/teleport or do something specific and new players join “a server” and there summoning char token is c.lastsummon = 0 and the people who have dismissed there familiar get c.lastsummon = -1 now you cant add both into a case or it wont work, Neither player will work with that case. So you would have to change the -1 to a 0 so both players can access the case. So technically speaking your reply is completely wrong for what this topic was aiming for.

Read full topic

item.title: Object +character token
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

yo dude 1345:

Ok so I’ve google searched and searched mopar ect… and well what I’m trying to do is to change a character token when it saves, To be specific i’m trying to change the token for summong, c.lastsummon = -1 img trying to get that token to save as 0 and not as -1 when a summoned npc is dismissed, Please help!Im using a Pi base BTW (Project Insanity).

-1 is equivalent to nothing or what you’re looking for, 0. Like slayerTask = 123 and the resetslayerTask = -1.

Read full topic
